🔷【Weatheproof Enclosure】 The all-metal cover of 30 Amp disconnect is made of premium galvanized steel, specifically designed for outdoor weather conditions, rain, dust, and rust-resistant. It protects the electrical outlet box against outdoor elements for lasting durability and reliability.

🔷【Secure Pull Out Switch】Our 30 amp AC disconnect switch features an easy-to-use pull-out switch design, allowing seamless control through the pulled-out handle for on/off functions. The handle cleverly stores in a closed compartment, eliminating concerns about handle misplacement.

🔷【Lockable Design】The waterproof 30 Amp disconnect box with a lock hole allows you to enhance security by adding a lock as needed. Whether installed in a garage, yard, or campsite, you don't have to worry about power theft or malicious disconnection of the power supply.

🔷【Easy Installation and Wire】The outdoor AC disconnect switch with cover features pre-drilled holes on the side, bottom, and back for easy knockout and removal, with ample space for wiring. Suitable for both DIY enthusiasts and professionals, it can be effortlessly mounted on a wall or fence as needed.

name: ABB TF30RCP • Weatherproof Fused AC Disconnect Switch • AC Disconnect 30A 240V • 1 Phase N3R • Horsepower Rated • 10kAIC
short_description: QUICK INSTALL, SAFE OPERATION - This 30 Amp, 240 V AC fused disconnect ensures fast installation and reliable service. Supports single-phase operation and a 10 kAIC interrupt rating for dependable disconnection in residential HVAC and similar setups.

FUSIBLE PULL-OUT DESIGN (FUSES NOT INCLUDED) - This unit features a pull-out style fused disconnect mechanism for safe isolation during maintenance. It is fusible, but fuses are not supplied. Please verify the correct fuse class/type and amp rating for your application.

TOUGH AS YOU NEED - Built from NEMA 3R weather-resistant G90 galvanized steel for corrosion protection. The durable outdoor-rated finish withstands rain, dust, and tampering, ensuring long-term reliability in demanding environments.

SECURE & USER-FRIENDLY - Includes padlock provisions, knockouts, and straight-in, straight-out wiring. Three-piece construction allows easy access to wiring areas. Terminals are rated for 60 °C/75 °C wire and accept solid or stranded copper and aluminium conductors.

TRUSTED INNOVATOR - ABB acquired GE Industrial Solutions in 2018. Today ABB continues manufacturing GE-branded electrical products, maintaining the same quality, reliability, and compliance standards trusted worldwide.
product_description: ABB TF30RCP For your safety, it is crucial to purchase only genuine, ABB-manufactured electrical products (inclusive of those branded GE or GE by ABB and now manufactured by ABB). Counterfeit and non-authentic products may fail to meet safety standards, putting you at risk. To ensure you receive safe, reliable products, check the product description and photos and verify that the product is described as an ABB, GE, or GE by ABB product and has labels with an ABB, GE, or GE by ABB logo. Please also check the product description to see if the product has been certified by third-party certification bodies such as UL, IC and/or Intertek. ABB acquired GE's Industrial Solutions business in 2018 and continues to manufacture GE, GE by ABB, and ABB branded products under a license from GE. For warranty information, please contact the manufacturer's customer service directly. You may also be able to find warranty information on the manufacturer's website.

short_description: This 30 amp disconnect switch is designed for applications requiring reliable performance and continuous service, enabling quick and simple power interruption. With a maximum carrying current of 30A, the disconnect switch is suitable for most applications.

The surface is coated with anti-corrosion and anti-rust paint, offering dual-layer protection. Meeting NEMA 3R standards, it can withstand outdoor weather conditions such as thunderstorms, hail, and strong winds. Compact in size, it saves space while providing ample room for wiring with a rational layout.
Both the bottom of the casing and the toggle bar are equipped with locking devices to prevent accidental opening or closing, ensuring stable operation and safety.
The installation is very simple and only takes ten minutes to complete. We strongly recommend professional electricians to carry out the installation.
